entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Nipawin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -15.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nipawin Airport 2:31 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

Temperature: -15.1°C

Humidity: 86 %

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
